author: mirichmo
body:
**Aditya Patwardhan (@adityapatwardhan)** has been a valued PowerShell team member for over three years and has demonstrated expertise in areas such as the Management/Utility/Core Cmdlets, Providers, Help System, Testing, and Code Coverage.
He has consistently delivered quality contributions to the project and demonstrated good judgment when performing Pull Request reviews.

Aditya has earned the trust of the existing PowerShell Repository Maintainers through his diligent work and is an excellent candidate to be a steward of the project.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @mirichmo the file `.spelling` needs to be updated.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @mirichmo could you please address the Travis CI failure?

title: Add Aditya as a Maintainer
